content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 1000 Euros per month. What is the rental price you are proposing?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Based on the 25 square meter apartment, I am proposing a rental price of 1200 Euros per month. This price takes into account the current market value of similar apartments in the area and also considers the amenities and location of the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate. How about 950 Euros per month?

I appreciate your time and effort in showing me the apartment. I would like to rent it. I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Ryanah. I understand that you would like to rent the apartment for 950 Euros per month. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I am willing to accept your offer. I agree to the price of 950 Euros per month. Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
